entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
